content: Always wanted to create your own website but with no cost? Read along to find out how you can do it too.
title: How I Created My First Website With Free Server And Domain.

content: This article offers a guide and step by step procedure on how I created my own personal website with free server and domain name using HUGO, Git, Github and Netlify.
title: How I Created My First Website With Free Server And Domain.

content: Kuldeep GehlotHi, I’m Kuldeep. I have 7 years of experience in E-commerce feild mainly in product data fulfilment, sourcing, uploading, researching, maintaining, email support and query solving. I am also more inclined toward quality checking of website content. Currently, I am looking for new career opportunities to upgrade. I have enough experience to occupy a managing position and I will be glad to work with your company. Lately in April 2021, I took break from my work to focus mainly on my improvements and learn new things on my own using free resources available online.
title: Hi there! Welcome.

content: Tools I KnowWhy I Started this Blog?It is simply because I want to document my progress, share my knowledge and acomplishments on what I have acheived learning things on my own and how anyone can do it too. I love the opportunity that I could be wrong, because that’s when learning happens. What will you be expecting from this website?Well, for starters, it will be all about various topics like Python tips, Python projects, Movies & Books Recommendations etc and my journey towards getting better and better in everyway.
